items.sentence: Let's get out of here and go somewhere quiet.
The search party has stopped looking for Tom.
I don't understand why you changed your mind.
I realized that I didn't understand anything.
I spent all day yesterday cleaning the house.
How long are Tom and I supposed to stay here?
My father died, leaving a large sum of money.
It'll be difficult for them to work together.
There's no need to mention that Tom was here.
Are you sure that you don't need to help Tom?
There are many reasons that I didn't do that.
Tom Jackson is my favorite Canadian musician.
That isn't going to get me in trouble, is it?
We'll do our best to persuade Tom to do that.
Tom isn't the kind of person to take revenge.
It took almost three years to build my house.
She was scared at the sight of the dead body.
She was quite nervous about her first flight.
She was playing with her sister at that time.
She was robbed her of her bag by a young man.
